name: Montezuma's Revenge - C64 Remake
description:
Montezuma's Revenge - C64 Remake Fan Project

It was my personal project for 2019. Montezuma's Revenge was my favorite C64 game back in 1986, when I first played it.
Started the project January 1st, and upload the first full playable level 1 build today, December 31th
Was completely redo, using references from websites, youtube gameplays and C64 emulators.
As I don't have the legal rights for commercial use, I post for free only level 1.
Made in Unity (2019.2)
Other tools: Gimp 2.10 and SoundForge Pro 13
